</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''vehicle''' unitName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> SQS <code>? '''vehicle''' [[player]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>!=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[player]] : [[hint]] "Player is in a vehicle"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> SQF<code>if ([[vehicle]] [[player]] != [[player]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "Player is in a vehicle"};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
